item.description:
Correction, the cover is $12.
--------------------------

Johnny D's is hosting a very rare music event, traditional Portuguese Fado music on Tuesday, July 22th.

The show starts at 8:30pm, please come at 7:30pm so we can enjoy conversation before the music begins.

The cover is $12.

I would really like to make an advance table reservation therefore I need an accurate count.
Please confirm your attendance as soon as you possibly can.
I would like to confirm the reservation by Sunday, July 20th.

Here is some information on the artist. I hope to see some familiar and new faces.



Helder Moutinho is one of the few male singers in Portugal?s Fado tradition, beloved by artists and audiences alike and known for his warm, powerful voice and depth of emotion. A songwriter and producer as well as singer, he is the winner of the Amalia Rodrigues Award for Best Album of 2004 with his ?Luz de Lisboa,? and a highly regarded performer across Europe. He appears with the traditional accompaniment of Portuguese guitar and classical guitar.




http://www.johnnyds.c...
http://www.eyefortale...
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a sign saying "Portuguese Meet-Up" at the table

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Fado Music (Helder Moutinho) at Johnny D's
